title: President Donald J. Trump Signs S. 96 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
February 26, 2018
On Monday, February 26, 2018, the President signed into law:S. 96, the “Improving Rural Call Quality and Reliability Act of 2017,” which requires certain providers of voice communication services to register with the Federal Communications Commission and comply with service quality standards.
